name: Fruitmania
overview: Fruitmania is a slot machine simulator for one person. Guus Hildesheim, who also did the graphics for this game, was sysop of the 'BBS de Saen', a Dutch modem-based bulletin board system (BBS). This game is based on a real fruitmachine. It uses the same bars and the same points. It doesn't check whether or not you are winning and it doesn't cheat.
